entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Wrigley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:31 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wrigley Airport 03:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -18.2°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -20.8°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:37 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 9:37 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:37 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
